subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: In a convincing show of precision and power in Saturday’s semifinal, Roger Federer shrugged off a second-set misstep and eliminated Novak Djokovic, 6-3, 5-7, 7-5, 6-2.
snippet: In a convincing show of precision and power in Saturday’s semifinal, Roger Federer shrugged off a second-set misstep and eliminated Novak Djokovic, 6-3, 5-7, 7-5, 6-2.
